code: import{getPerson,getPeople}from"../../database/peopleData";import{getRandomElement}from"../../utils";var getQuestion=function getQuestion(){var isMale=Math.floor(Math.random()*2);var person=getPerson(isMale).firstName;var people=getPeople().firstName;var adjectives=['interesting','impressive','exciting','excited','experienced','inexperienced','honest','awesome','artistic','authentic','expressive','easy-going','efficient','exemplary','introverted','obedient','odd'];var adjective=getRandomElement(adjectives);var prompt="".concat(person," is a ").concat(adjective," person. / ").concat(people);var answer="".concat(people," are ").concat(adjective," people.");return{prompt:prompt,answer:answer};};export default getQuestion;
